bug.author: nglee
bug.summary: CUDA Median filter tests fail with CUDA 9.1 but pass with CUDA 8.0
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => lates 3.4 branch 44572fa Operating System / Platform => Windows 64 Bit Compiler => Visual Studio 2015
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
In opencv_test_cudafilters test, CUDA_Filters/Median.Accuracy tests fail when compiled with CUDA 9.1, but the tests pass when compiled with CUDA 8.0.

comments.comment:
The cause might be similar to the cause in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/issues/11621>#11621</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/issues/11621>#11621</denchmark-link>
